import Layout from '../../components/Layout'; import Link from 'next/link'; import axios from 'axios'; import moment from 'moment'; import { API } from '../../config'; import { getCookie } from '../../helpers/auth'; import withUser from '../withUser'; //import withAdmin from '../withAdmin'; const User = ({ user, userLinks, token }) => { const listOfLinks = () => userLinks.map((l, i) => (
{l.title}
{l.url}
{moment(l.createdAt).fromNow()} by {l.postedBy.name}
)); return (

{user.name}'s dashboard /{user.role}

  • Submit a link
  • Update profile

Your links

{listOfLinks()}

{l.type} / {l.medium} {l.categories.map((c,i) => ( (c.name) ))} {l.clicks} clicks Delete Update
); }; export default withUser(User);
